name: DetectiveJoe
description:
Use your DETECTIVE skills to get to the end of the level. On the way you have to avoid gabs and obstacles to find the right way. But do not be tricked by the NOT real objects in the level. Use your magnifying glass which can guide you the way through.

Controls:

WSAD and SPACE to move and jump

Left Mouse for your magnifying glass.

Art by: @Tebslept

Programming by: @DerVictor / @VictorGames2022

Programms:

Unity

Photoshop

Final Cut Pro X

(I just quickly want do say, that a lot of this game is inspired by a game from Brackeys him self called "Detective Truth". I just loved the concept and as a beginner in Development i thought, why not try it out.)
